DOC.brief_summary: Investigators hypothesize goal-directed fluid therapy use stroke volume variation improve postoperative recovery patient undergoing free flap reconstruction head neck cancer resection . Investigators compare effect goal-directed fluid therapy use stroke volume variation recovery patient undergoing free flap reconstruction head neck cancer resection .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Goal-directed Fluid Therapy Using Stroke Volume Variation Patients Undergoing Free Flap Reconstruction After Head Neck Cancer Resection
